Plot: By Any Means follows a clandestine unit living on the edge and playing the criminal elite at their own game, existing in the grey area between the letter of the law and true justice.
Title: By Any Means
Writer: Tony Jordan, Richard Lazarus, James Payne, Jeff Povey, Richard Zajdlic
Actors: Warren Brown, Shelley Conn, Elliot Knight, Gina McKee
